LanguageData.ZP_PrantSpice.label: Spice
LanguageData.ZP_PrantSpice.description: A generic plant that has been modified to grow generic spices. No one knows what spices they are exactly, but they seem nifty in cooking.
LanguageData.ZP_PrantSalt.label: Salt
LanguageData.ZP_PrantSalt.description: 調味料に使える天然塩を収穫できる。塩田で生水を蒸発させて作る。重労働だが朝に栽培できれば夕方には収穫できる。
